column6: Hot off the heels of suffering the nightmarish experiments of the man called Contagion, Wolverine is confronted by renegade spacemen Monark Starstalker and Paradox, who have their own set of test they'd like to run on him. But anyone preparing to stick Logan with needles of techno-organic viruses should be prepared to feel the sharp sting of adamantium claws in the gut. It's WOLVERINE: THE BEST THERE IS VS. ROGUE GALACTIC BOUNTY HUNTERS AND THEIR ROBOT FALCON!  THUNDERDOME!
column8: | penciller (cover):Bryan Hitch | writer:Charlie Huston | penciller:Juan Jose Ryp
